thread.title: Technica Brings in Industry Leader Mark Cabrey as New Chief Financial Officer

author: cnbc.com
title: Technica Brings in Industry Leader Mark Cabrey as New Chief Financial Officer
text:
DULLES, Va., March 6, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Technica Corporation , a leader in high-end systems engineering and operations and maintenance for mission-critical networks and applications, announced Mark Cabrey has been named as the company's Chief Financial Officer. Mark's track record as a successful CFO, and his extensive customer and corporate relationships, will continue to elevate Technica's standing in the government IT industry.
"We are pleased to have Mark join the company and perform a smooth transition of the CFO role to him," said Bill Groah, co-founder of Technica. "I look forward to watching him lead contracts, human resources, accounting and financial management functions to benefit our customers, the senior leadership team and the entire company."
Prior to joining Technica, Mark spent four years at Phacil as their first CFO and later as President and Chief Operating Officer. Before joining Phacil, he served as the Corporate Controller at Apptis, a New Mountain Capital owned company, and led the sale of the company to URS in 2011.
"We are excited to have Mark join Technica's leadership team as we continue to transform our company for the future. His proven business acumen, financial insight, operational skills and extensive government IT industry experience will help us deliver even greater value to our customers," said Miguel Collado, co-founder and CEO.
Mark is the most recent addition to the Technica leadership team. Doug Sickler was named VP of Business Development in 2017. Doug, a former US Navy officer, leads all business development functions, including strategic account planning, deal strategy development and execution, and proposal operations. Doug came to Technica after building and leading high performing sales and capture organizations at Unisys and Dell Services.
About Technica Corporation
Technica Corporation, founded in 1991, provides high-end system engineering services to Defense, Intelligence, Law Enforcement, and Federal civilian agencies. The company specializes in systems engineering; integration and testing; cybersecurity; and product development, deployment, and support. Technica invests heavily in R&D and is leveraging big data, machine learning, artificial intelligence, blockchain technology and high performance computing to support its customers. For more information, please visit www.technicacorp.com and follow us on Twitter @TechnicaCorp .
